pkgmetadata.longdescription: Fast Spatial Regression using Moran Eigenvectors // Functions for estimating spatial varying coefficient models, mixed models, and other spatial regression models for Gaussian and non- Gaussian data. Moran eigenvectors are used to an approximate spatial Gaussian processes. These processes are used for modeling the spatial processes in residuals and regression coefficients. For details see Murakami (2021) arXiv:1703.04467.
